SELECT prtmt.prt_cd, --매장번호 prtmt.prt_nm, --매장명 prtmt.prt_dt_cd, --거래처구분코드 1본사2매장 CASE WHEN prtmt.prt_ss_cd = '10' THEN cddt.dtl_cd_nm WHEN prtmt.prt_ss_cd = '80' THEN cddt.dtl_cd_nm ELSE cddt.dtl_cd_nm END AS prt_ss_cd --거래처상태코드 FROM ma_prt_mt prtmt --거래처관리 table LEFT JOIN ma_code_dt cddt --코드상세table ON prtmt.prt_ss_cd = cddt.dtl_cd WHERE cddt.code_cd = 'PRT_SS_CD'
and prt_nm like '%' || #{prt_nm} || '%' --prt_nm or prt_cd like '%' || #{prt_nm} || '%'
